2// mtl_glslang_mtl_utils.h

7
8#ifndef mtl_glslang_mtl_utils_h
9#define mtl_glslang_mtl_utils_h
10#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
11#include "libANGLE/renderer/ProgramImpl.h"
12#include "libANGLE/renderer/glslang_wrapper_utils.h"
13#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_constants.h"
14#include "libANGLE/renderer/metal/mtl_common.h"
15
16namespace rx
17{
18namespace mtl
19{
20struct SamplerBinding
21{
22 uint32_t textureBinding = 0;
23 uint32_t samplerBinding = 0;
24};
25
26struct TranslatedShaderInfo
27{
28 void reset();
29 // Translated Metal source code
30 std::string metalShaderSource;
31 // Metal library compiled from source code above. Used by ProgramMtl.
32 AutoObjCPtr<id<MTLLibrary>> metalLibrary;
33 std::array<SamplerBinding, kMaxGLSamplerBindings> actualSamplerBindings;
34 std::array<uint32_t, kMaxGLUBOBindings> actualUBOBindings;
35 std::array<uint32_t, kMaxShaderXFBs> actualXFBBindings;
36 bool hasUBOArgumentBuffer;
37};
38void MSLGetShaderSource(const gl::ProgramState &programState,
39 const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources,
40 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> *shaderSourcesOut,
41 ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap *variableInfoMapOut);
42
43angle::Result GlslangGetMSL(const gl::Context *glContext,
44 const gl::ProgramState &programState,
45 const gl::Caps &glCaps,
46 const gl::ShaderMap<std::string> &shaderSources,
47 const ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap &variableInfoMap,
48 gl::ShaderMap<TranslatedShaderInfo> *mslShaderInfoOut,
49 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> *mslCodeOut,
50 size_t xfbBufferCount);
51
52// Get equivalent shadow compare mode that is used in translated msl shader.
53uint MslGetShaderShadowCompareMode(GLenum mode, GLenum func);
54
55} // namespace mtl
56} // namespace rx
57
58#endif /* mtl_glslang_mtl_utils_h */
59
